cases.title: Forensic Accounting Expert Testifies in Air Force Base Construction Case
cases.description: A Forensic Accounting Expert witness was allowed to testify on the the pricing methodology used to analyze the alleged damages in the development of a defense base.

cases.title: Motion to Dismiss Legal Ethics Expert Witness Denied
cases.description: The U.S. District Court - Southern District of Texas found Defendant's Legal Ethics Expert Witness testimony was based on his experience and evidence in the record.

cases.title: Mechanical Engineer Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying on Plaintiff's State of Mind
cases.description: A Mechanical Engineering Expert Witness was excluded from testifying on plaintiff's habit of parking his employer's truck which crashed into another vehicle.
